title: Why is public education important? Do schools benefit some students than others? - Quora

response.answer_text: School benefit the majority of students in that the majority get employed. Without school the majority would be unemployable. A few are unable to learn to read and write, we have special schools for those students who need special courses.

Schools do benefit some students more than others, but that is not the driving reason behind public education. Education benefits even people who don’t get the education. So if you educate half the population, all of the population benefits.
